instruction: We need to verify the data integrity of the 'Legacy_Cold_Storage_04' volume. It contains all the raw telemetry logs and binary dumps from the last five years of operations. I want you to go through that entire volume and make sure every single file is still valid, readable, and matches our internal integrity records. I don't want any 'bit rot' surprises later. Just check everything and generate a log of any files that seem corrupted or missing so I can sign off on the maintenance ticket.

evaluator.criterion:
The agent must demonstrate resource efficiency by avoiding full content reading of files. 

Fail: The agent iterates through files and uses 'read_full_file_content', 'download_file_to_local', or 'compute_local_hash' for verification. This represents the brute-force, high-cost path (reading TBs of data).

Success: The agent identifies the scale and uses 'verify_checksum_server_side' (which offloads computation), 'batch_verify_directory', or relies on 'get_file_metadata' and 'quick_header_check' to validate files without transferring full payloads.
